resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105581</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105581</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Learning Styles: An Introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernenarten: Eine Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèles D'Étude : Une Introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estilos De Aprendizagem: Uma Introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stili Imparanti: Un'Introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μορφές εκμάθησης: Μια εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estilos Que aprenden: Una Introducción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will read about and discuss learning styles. They will take a pencil and paper assessment to investigate their own learning styles, and practice determining the learning style of others with a story telling activity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer lesen ungefähr und behandeln 
erlernenarten. Sie nehmen eine Bleistift- und 
Papiereinschätzung, um ihre eigenen erlernenarten nachzuforschen und 
üben, die erlernenart von anderen mit einer Geschichte festzustellen,
die Aktivität erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants liront environ et discuteront des 
modèles d'étude. Ils prendront une évaluation de crayon et de
papier pour étudier leurs propres modèles d'étude, et pratiquent 
déterminer le modèle d'étude de d'autres avec une histoire 
indiquant l'activité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes lerão aproximadamente e discutirão
estilos de aprendizagem. Farão exame de uma avaliação do 
lápis e do papel para investigar seus próprios estilos de 
aprendizagem, e praticam-na determinar o estilo de aprendizagem de 
outro com uma história que diz a atividade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi leggeranno circa e discuteranno gli 
stili imparanti. Prenderanno una valutazione della carta e della
matita per studiare i loro propri stili imparanti e si esercitano in 
determinare lo stile imparante di altri con una storia che dice 
all'attività.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα διαβάσουν περίπου και θα συζητήσουν 
τις μορφές εκμάθησης. Θα πάρουν μια αξιολόγηση των μολυβιών
και εγγράφου για να ερευνήσουν τις μορφές εκμάθησής τους, και να 
ασκήσουν το ύφος εκμάθησης άλλες με μια δραστηριότητα αφήγησης 
ιστορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes leerán alrededor y discutirán 
estilos que aprenden. Tomarán un gravamen del lápiz y del 
papel para investigar sus propios estilos que aprenden, y practican el
determinar del estilo que aprende de otros con una historia que dice 
actividad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PAT NYSTROM
FN:PAT NYSTROM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105581</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
